[http://www.eclipse.org/webtools/community/tutorials/BuildJ2EEWebApp/BuildJ2EEWebApp.html Tutorial on setting up eclipse for a new web project, I followed it to get our project going]

Additional steps I had to take to get tomcat to launch from within eclipse:
  *Tick the 'publish module contexts to spearate XML files' checkbox in the server conf page
  *Install the [http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/apr.html Tomcat apr]
